name: Vegan Mug Cake (Snickerdoodle)
description: This vegan mug cake is absolutely perfect when you feel like having cake for dessert but don't have enough time for baking! And the best thing is that it's a snickerdoodle mug cake!! 5 minutes is all you need for this easy individual-size dessert!

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the margarine in a little pot on the stove top. Combine the ingredients in a small bowl and stir well. Pour the batter into a mug. Sprinkle some more sugar and cinnamon on top and microwave the vegan mug cake for one and a half minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Melt the margarine in a little pot on the stove top. Combine the ingredients in a small bowl and stir well. Pour the batter into a mug. Sprinkle some more sugar and cinnamon on top and microwave the vegan mug cake for one and a half minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Let it cool down for a few minutes. It's best when you eat it warm right out of the mug. Enjoy!
